sentences: COP President Nkoana-Mashabane reminded parties of the practice since COP 1 of applying the draft rules of procedure (FCCC/CP/1996/2) with the exception of draft rule 42 on voting, which has remained unresolved since COP 1.
PAPUA NEW GUINEA expressed concerns, suggesting that lack of agreement on voting can mean lowest common denominator outcomes.
Further consultations will be held during COP 17.
